thread.section_title: Public Storage Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Public Storage | publicstorage.com | 6 of 581
thread.title: Lisa Basye
thread.title_full: Public Storage reviewed by Lisa Basye

author: Lisa Basye
title: Lisa Basye
text: Overall my experience was good. I made a reservation online and did the pre check-in to make it faster. The only thing was nowhere on the site or in any communication I had before my check-in was I made aware that the type of locks they accepted had changed (from the last time I had rented) and that I would need to purchase a specific type of lock (not available for purchase elsewhere) at the time of check in. It was not a big deal, but was more money then I was expecting to spend at check in. When you reserve online they give you a Quote: , the lock price should be included.
